{"id":1038565337,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"2 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1693667330,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"129 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1038565337/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Maximum Sum of Almost Unique Subarray","memory":"63.7 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    long long maxSum(vector<int>& nums, int m, int k) {\n          unordered_map<int,int> mp;\n        long long ans=0;\n        int i=0,j=0;\n        int n=nums.size();\n        long long temp=0;\n        while(j<n)\n        {\n            temp+=nums[j];\n            mp[nums[j]]++;\n            while(j-i+1>k)\n                 {\n                mp[nums[i]]--;\n                temp-=nums[i];\n                if(mp[nums[i]]==0)mp.erase(nums[i]);\n                i++;\n            }\n            if(j-i+1==k)\n            {\n                if(mp.size()>=m)\n                    ans=max(ans,temp);\n            }\n            j++;\n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"maximum-sum-of-almost-unique-subarray","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
